ygData.subject: Chanda Miller and Baobob Miller Quest *Spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: To whom it may concern, to get Chandra and Baobob to craft these great bear/wolf skin items for you all you need to do is raise some faction with them. You
ygData.messageBody:
To whom it may concern, to get Chandra and Baobob to craft these great bear/wolf skin items for you all you need to do is raise some faction with them. You must have a con of indifferent or higher before they will make you the cloaks. What I did was kill bandits in the Karranas, also Splitpaw gnolls give +faction for KaranaResidents so start the slaying! Oh and enjoy your new garments, just don't flood the market ok? You'll put me out of business!


-Eantos (16 Erudite Wizard, Fennin Ro)
